com.alexkasko.tasks
Class TaskStageChain

java.lang.Object
  com.alexkasko.tasks.TaskStageChain
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable
public class TaskStageChain
extends Object
implements Serializable

Implementation of task stages list. Must be provided by Task instances. Thread-safe.

Author:
alexkasko Date: 5/22/12
See Also:
TaskEngine, Task, TaskProcessorProvider, Serialized Form

Returns:
